title: 'The Lady Who Fell To Earth': Thin stressed geometric sans
content:
Hi guys

[http://www.fashion-ation.net/System/Assets/ufo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202120726/http:/www.fashion-ation.net/System/Assets/ufo.jpg "http://www.fashion-ation.net/System/Assets/ufo.jpg")

whats the font for "the lady who fell to earth" ??

much appreciated
author: ppk812

comments.content:
anyone have any ideas??

best regards.

This free font isnt too far off:  
 [http://www.subflux.com/Fonts/FontsRecre\_Retro.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202120726/http:/www.subflux.com/Fonts/FontsRecre_Retro.htm "http://www.subflux.com/Fonts/FontsRecre\_Retro.htm")
fashion thin is similar but that R is very distinct, most likely custom face?
